name: PowerCenter:Avoid too many Fields in a transformation
description:
List all Transformations with more than X computed fields.
The X threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
It does not take into account the following Transformation Types : Router , Union , Aggregator, Joiner.
output:
This report lists all Mappings, Mapplets and Folders with Transformations having too many computed field
it provides the following information
Mapping or Mapplet or Folder full name, Transformation full name
rationale: Too many fields in a transformation could decrease drastically performance because thread in charge of the transformation, per partition, may be overwhelmed.
remediation: Split transformation with lot of computed fields into several transformations
total: Total number of Mappings, Mapplets and Folders
